content: Can someone give this stream a description please
"IHE and use of FHIR - discussion on IHE profiles using FHIR, templates, planning.. Announcements and general questions"
This stream is not restricted to IHE use of FHIR. Given that chat.fhir.org is now where ALL topics in hl7 exist; then this stream should be about any IHE profile .

Integrating the Healthcare Enterprise (IHE) is a standards organization specializing in constraining standards based on use-case analysis. These IHE-Profiles are Implementation Guides. Discuss topics here about the IHE process, or about IHE profiles.
